SupWiz | Full-stack Engineer, Data Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer | Copenhagen, Denmark | ONSITE, REMOTE, Full-time | https://www.supwiz.com/careers

We are a research based startup (started 6 months ago, 12 employees) with good funding and lots of customers. Our main focus is customer support, where we solve problems in NLP such as ticket-routing, expert finding, predictive maintenance, and make chat bots.

Everybody in the team has strong theoretical backgrounds (publications in NIPS, STOC, FOCS), and everybody is regularly in contact with our customers. We are looking to expand this team, mainly with onsite people, but part week remote work is possible.

Please apply to contact@supwiz.com and mention Hacker News!
